pkg_prefix.description: The absolute path for your package.

pkg_svc_path.description: Where the running service is located. $HAB_ROOT_PATH/svc/$pkg_name by default.

pkg_svc_data_path.description: Where the running service's data is located. $pkg_svc_path/data by default.

pkg_svc_files_path.description: Where the gossiped configuration files are located. $pkg_svc_path/files by default.

pkg_svc_var_path.description: Where the running service variable data is located. $pkg_svc_path/var by default.

pkg_svc_config_path.description: Where the running service's configuration files are located. $pkg_svc_path/config by default.

pkg_svc_static_path.description: Where the running service's static data is located. $pkg_svc_path/static by default.

HAB_CACHE_SRC_PATH.description: The default path where source archives are downloaded, extracted and compiled.

HAB_CACHE_ARTIFACT_PATH.description: The default download path for Habitat packages.

HAB_PKG_PATH.description: The path containing all locally installed Habitat packages.

PLAN_CONTEXT.description: The location on your local development machine of the files in your plan directory.

LD_RUN_PATH.description: Path(s) to search for binaries at runtime.

PREFIX.description: Where to install the software. Same as $pkg_prefix.
